eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}

<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "Dnt": "1",
    "Pragma": "no-cache",
    "Sec-Ch-Ua": '"Google Chrome";v="123", "Not:A-Brand";v="8", "Chromium";v="123"',
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Mobile": "?1",
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Platform": '"Android"',
    "Upgrade-Insecure-Requests": "1",
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "Accept": "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7",
    "X-Requested-With": "cn.nr19.mbrowser",
    "Sec-Fetch-Site": "same-origin",
    "Sec-Fetch-Mode": "navigate",
    "Sec-Fetch-User": "?1",
    "Sec-Fetch-Dest": "document",
    "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, zstd",
    "Accept-Language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7",
    "Origin": Get('url'),
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));

    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes("rank")) {
        var list = java.getElements('.manga-rank');
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].select('.manga-title').text(),
                'author': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[1].text()).replace(/[+·，\|\\]/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/:\//g, ':').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\.\//g, '.'),
                'kind': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[0].text()).replace(/\|/g, ',').replace(/\s/g, ',').replace(/、/g, ','),
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('.manga-rank-cover mip-img').attr('src') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        Data();
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.items;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover.replace(/\\/g, ''),
                'url': Get('url') + '/manga/' + list[i].manga_code
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pn=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pn=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/latest"},"method":"GET"}');
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.items[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ');
        code = baseUrl.replace(/.*manga\//, '');
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + date : title,
            'link': Get('url') + '/reads/' + code + '/' + list[i].id
        });

} else {

}

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank1 = [
    '全部',
    '推荐',
    '热门',
    '上架'
];
orderby1 = [
    'manga',
    'hots',
    'dayup',
    'newss'
];
for (i in rank1) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby1[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank1[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  地　　区  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank2 = [
    '韩漫',
    '国漫',
    '日漫',
    '欧美',
    '其他'
];
orderby2 = [
    'kr',
    'cn',
    'jp',
    'ou-mei',
    'qita',
];
for (i in rank2) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-genre/${orderby2[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank2[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '复仇','古风','奇幻','逆袭','异能','宅向','穿越','热血',
    '纯爱','系统','重生','冒险','灵异','大女主','剧情','恋爱',
    '玄幻','女神','科幻','魔幻','推理','猎奇','治愈','都市',
    '异形','青春','末日','悬疑','修仙','战斗'
];
link = [
    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架'
];
name = [
    'hanguo',
    'hanguo-lianzai',
    'hanguo-wanjie',
    'hanguo',
    'hanguo',
    'riben',
    'riben-lianzai',
    'riben-wanjie',
    'riben',
    'riben',
    'dalu',
    'dalu-lianzai',
    'dalu-wanjie',
    'dalu',
    'dalu',
    'oumei',
    'oumei-lianzai',
    'oumei-wanjie',
    'oumei',
    'oumei'
];
type = [
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/app/comic/index?sort=${type[i]}&filter=${name[i]}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    韩漫    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(6, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    日本    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(12, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    国漫    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(18, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    欧美    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : Map('账号：');
var a = 0;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) {

            });

            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');

            });

    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');

        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay-albums a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

    for (i in list) {
        name = $('.book-list-info-title');
        author = $('.book-list-info-bottom-item').replace(/[+、&]/g, '/').replace(/[.]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\&\//g, '').replace(/amp;/g, '').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/:\//g, ':');

        intro = $('.book-list-info-desc').replace(/免费.*/, '');
        cover = list[i].select('.lazy.book-list-cover-img').attr('src').includes('imagecover_s.png') ? list[i].select('.lazy.book-list-cover-img').attr('data-original') : list[i].select('.lazy.book-list-cover-img').attr('src');

            'kind': kind.replace(/已/g, ',').replace(/中/g, ','),
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.book-list-cover a').attr('href') + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
        });

    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    var searchkey = java.get(Get('url') + "searchkey");
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.book-list li')).includes(String(list[0])) || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

ruleBookContentReplaceRegex:
<js>
String(result)
.replace(/\s*发表于\s*/g,"⌚️")
.replace(/回复:『\s*/g,'回复:『')
</js>
##以下内容需要积分高于 \d+ 才可浏览
ruleChapterList:
<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

	p+=String(a)+String(b)
	}
p

    let body = "siteid=" + id[1] + "&bid=" + id[2] + "&cid=" + id[3];
    let path = "novelsearch/chapter/transcode.html,";
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    java.ajax(String(source.bookSourceUrl + path + JSON.stringify(option)))
}
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

//分类生成
	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作

<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {
    var x = Array();
    var k, AA, BB, CC, DD, a, b, c, d;
    var S11 = 7,
    S12 = 12,
    S13 = 17,
    S14 = 22;
    var S21 = 5,
    S22 = 9,
    S23 = 14,
    S24 = 20;
    var S31 = 4,
    S32 = 11,
    S33 = 16,
    S34 = 23;
    var S41 = 6,
    S42 = 10,
    S43 = 15,
    S44 = 21;
    string = uTF8Encode(string);
    x = convertToWordArray(string);
    a = 0x67452301;
    b = 0xEFCDAB89;
    c = 0x98BADCFE;
    d = 0x10325476;
    for (k = 0; k < x.length; k += 16) {
        AA = a;
        BB = b;
        CC = c;
        DD = d;
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 0], S11, 0xD76AA478);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 1], S12, 0xE8C7B756);
        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 2], S13, 0x242070DB);
        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 3], S14, 0xC1BDCEEE);
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 4], S11, 0xF57C0FAF);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 5], S12, 0x4787C62A);
        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 6], S13, 0xA8304613);
        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 7], S14, 0xFD469501);
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 8], S11, 0x698098D8);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 9], S12, 0x8B44F7AF);
        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 10], S13, 0xFFFF5BB1);
        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 11], S14, 0x895CD7BE);
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 12], S11, 0x6B901122);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 13], S12, 0xFD987193);
        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 14], S13, 0xA679438E);
        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 15], S14, 0x49B40821);
        a = GG(a, b, c, d, x[k + 1], S21, 0xF61E2562);
        d = GG(d, a, b, c, x[k + 6], S22, 0xC040B340);
        c = GG(c, d, a, b, x[k + 11], S23, 0x265E5A51);
        b = GG(b, c, d, a, x[k + 0], S24, 0xE9B6C7AA);
        a = GG(a, b, c, d, x[k + 5], S21, 0xD62F105D);
        d = GG(d, a, b, c, x[k + 10], S22, 0x2441453);
        c = GG(c, d, a, b, x[k + 15], S23, 0xD8A1E681);
        b = GG(b, c, d, a, x[k + 4], S24, 0xE7D3FBC8);
        a = GG(a, b, c, d, x[k + 9], S21, 0x21E1CDE6);
        d = GG(d, a, b, c, x[k + 14], S22, 0xC33707D6);
        c = GG(c, d, a, b, x[k + 3], S23, 0xF4D50D87);
        b = GG(b, c, d, a, x[k + 8], S24, 0x455A14ED);

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function parseComments(n){
  for(var c=[],e=0;e<n.length;e++){
    var o=n[e]; c.push("".concat(o.createrId.userName,"｜").concat(o.createdAt.slice(0,10),"\n评分：").concat("🌟".repeat(o.score),"\n评语：").concat(o.content.replace(/([\u4e00-\u9fa5])(?=\n|$)/,"$1……").replace(/([^。！？—…]{9}[。；！？—…]+”?)([\u4e00-\u9fa5][^。！？—…]{7})/g,"$1\n$2")))}
return c.join("\n————\n");}
var data = JSON.parse(result);
data=data.data.comments;
data.length == 0 ? '暂无评价！': parseComments(data);
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author##<[^<>]+>
ruleSearch.lastChapter:
score@put:{updateAt:$.updateAt}<js>
var score = result =="0"? "【无人评价】": "好评率"+(result > 10 ? result:result*10)+"%";
" " +"@get:{updateAt}".slice(0,10)+" 更新"
+"•" 
+""+parseInt({{$.countWord}}/10000)+'万字'
+ "•😊" 
+score;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
if(pageCount>1){pageCount=2};
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <pageCount; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=latest&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
